Hore! Pendakian Gunung Tambora Resmi Dibuka Lagi
05 Nov 2019, 11:10 by Faruk Nickyrawi


Gunung Tambora (Foto dok. TNGT)

Dompu - Kebakaran hutan dan padang sabana di kawasan Taman Nasional Tambora (TNT) Dompu NTB telah padam. Kini aktivitas pendakian Gunung Tambora telah dibuka.Dibuka kembalinya jalur pendakian oleh Balai Taman Nasional Tambora dengan memperhatikan tidak terjadinya lagi kebakaran hutan dan lahan (karhutla) yang sering terjadi di wilayah tersebut. Sehingga tidak lagi akan yang mengancam atau menganggu keselamatan para pendaki."Beberapa hari ini tidak ada Karhut di kawasan TN Tambora. Mulai hari ini pendakian sudah dibuka kembali," ungkap Kepala Balai TN Tambora, Murlan Dameria Pane, pada detikcom, Selasa (05/11/2019).Aktivitas pendakian resmi dibuka untuk semua pintu masuk atau jalur pendakian seperti di jalur Pancasila, Doroncanga, Piong, dan Kawinda To'i. "Betul, semua jalur pendakian kita buka kembali setelah kita putuskan untuk menutup sementara beberapa waktu lalu," ujar Murlan.Sebelumnya, Balai TN Tambora memutuskan untuk menutup sementara aktivitas pendakian di gunung Tambora. Hal itu dilakukan menyusul dengan terjadinya kebakaran hebat yang melanda kawasan tersebut.Simak Video "7 Pendaki Asal Singapura Terjebak Kebakaran di Gunung Raung"[Gambas:Video 20detik](msl/krs)

Hurray! Mount Tambora Climbing is Officially Opened Again
05 Nov 2019, 11:10 by Faruk Nickyrawi


Mount Tambora (Photo doc. TNGT)

Dompu - Forest fires and savannas in the Tambora National Park (TNT) area of Dompu NTB have been extinguished. Now the climbing activity of Mount Tambora has been opened. The return of the hiking trail by the Tambora National Park Office by taking into account that there are no more forest and land fires (karhutla) that often occur in the region. So that it will no longer threaten or disrupt the safety of the climbers. "Some days there is no forest fires in the Tambora NP area. Starting today the climb has been reopened," said Tambora TN Hall Head, Murlan Dameria Pane, on AFP on Tuesday (05 / 11/2019). The official climbing activity is opened for all entrances or hiking trails such as the Pancasila, Doroncanga, Piong, and Kawinda To'i paths. "That's right, all of our hiking routes have reopened after we decided to temporarily close some time ago," Murlan said. Previously, Tambora National Park Office decided to temporarily close the climbing activities on Mount Tambora. This was done following the great fire that struck the area.
